public_link_description: You can share this link with anyone.
private_link_description: This link provides a possibility to edit your registry. Don't share it.

home_page_description: Creating and sharing your perfect gift list has never been easier. With our service, you can streamline your gift-giving experience and make every special occasion unforgettable.
home_page_create_description: Start by creating a personalized gift registry. Add the items you love and organize them the way you want.
home_page_mode_description: Create your registry as a guest or log in using your Google account for added convenience and security.
home_page_share_description: Share the registry link with anyone you want to invite. They can easily view your wishlist and choose the perfect gift.
home_page_ready_description: Click the button below to begin creating your gift registry today. Whether it‚Äôs for a birthday, wedding, baby shower, or any special occasion, we‚Äôve got you covered!
